'''"Kujirai Art, Temari Jutsu"''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to play [[Temari]] with [[Kid Kujirai]]. The player can unlock Temari in Co-op Mode by successfully completing three of Kid Kujirai's Temari challenges in one of his locations.

==Gameplay Notes==
* This commission can be done after completing ''[[Temaria Game]]''.
